British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We are very happy to say that details of our Summer School 2013 can now be found on our website by following the below link:
http://www.britishschool.edu.my/en/curriculum/summer-school.aspx
If you would like your child to participate in any of the courses provided throughout the Summer School then please complete the application form and hand it into the school reception area. Please note the deadline for all entries and payments is Friday 12th July 2013.
Please find below an attachment with more information regarding which courses are available for certain year groups. Please note that The X Factory course will now be available to 6 year olds in the first two weeks of the Summer School.
